plot: A documentary about the history of witchcraft, told in a variety of styles, from illustrated slideshow to dramatised events of alleged real-life events, right up to the early twentieth century (when the film was made). Depending on which version you're watching, the commentary is either in the form of intertitles or narration by William S.Burroughs, recorded in the mid-1960s.   Written by  Michael Brooke
title: La brujería a través de los tiempos (Häxan)

lists.title: 1001 Películas que hay que ver antes de morir
